forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. High near 15C. Winds ESE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 58F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 55F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with scattered showers and thunderstorms during the evening becoming more widespread overnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers likely. It will be windy at times, especially early. Low near 50F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. SSE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High near 55F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 47F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 57F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 48F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
